classes.description: Applies the tooltip's visibility on :hover to its trigger. This is a CSS-only solution and not recommended.
Inverts all child styles to work on dark backgrounds.
Defines which side of the tooltip its arrow appears. Examples below.

accessible.description: Use this role on the tooltip element to ensure more reliable readout support.
Reads out the tooltip content as a supplementary description for its trigger when the trigger is focused. The aria-describedby value should match a unique CSS ID applied to d-tooltip.
